about.title: About
about.content: I am a curious and sociable person, able to work in a team or independently. I have nearly 2 years of working experience with the Web Development technologies. I always tend to exceed my expectations, and I am always passionate about any project I am working on. I like learning new things and following best practices.

responsibilities.item1: Actively engaged with our clients to ensure top-of-the-line services & consultancy through my work.
responsibilities.item2: Working with tools like: AngularJS, Angular, React, SCSS, NodeJS, Jira

responsibilities.item1: Aiding customers to build reliable WordPress websites
responsibilities.item2: Solving/reporting bugs and debugging (PHP, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL)

project1.title: React Weather App
project1.description: A weather app built with React and Express which enables the user to search theweather in certain cities around the world. The app automatically detects your locationand displays the weather information that is most relevant to you.
